text: This obsoletes IRM 1.2.54, Servicewide Policies and Authorities, Delegations of Authority for Security, Privacy and Assurance Activities.

This material in IRM 1.2.54 has been moved to IRM 1.2.2.16 Delegations of Authority for Security, Privacy and Assurance Activities. All Delegation Orders contained in IRM 1.2.40 through IRM 1.2.54 were consolidated and moved to IRM 1.2.2, Servicewide Delegation Orders. This IRM has been updated to include the following revised delegation order.
Director, Servicewide Policy, Directives and Electronic Resources Research, Applied Analytics and Statistics
